newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SOCCER-SINGAPORE TO LEGALISE SOCCER BETTING.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-SINGAPORE TO LEGALISE SOCCER BETTING.

text.p: Singapore said on Friday it would legalise betting on football to generate funds for its fledgling S-League.
Communications Minister Mah Bow Tan said in a speech a special task force had been set up to work out ways of implementing the decision.
He said betting would pump money into the S-League, now in its second season, and provide funds for youth development as well as the national squad.
